comments.body:
Plexus doesn't use directly log4j but [plexus -logging|https://svn.codehaus.org/plexus/plexus-logging/trunk/].
You can configure plexus-logging to use the real impl you want.
Sample here to use a wrapper to log4j.
{code:xml} 
    <component>
      <role>org.codehaus.plexus.logging.LoggerManager</role>
      <implementation>org.codehaus.plexus.logging.log4j.Log4JLoggerManager</implementation>
etc...
{code} 
The default implementation used is console
See http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-3438 for a work-around, to override the default dependencies for plexus-archiver. That fix worked for me.
